That introduction is quite nice. I am looking forward being able to use
JUnit 4.

Just one question:

since there is no longer any static dependencies with Junit TestCase,
should the tests be written in the class to be tested or in another
class?

I was used to create a test source folder with all my tests cases.

Using annotations, I would prefer declaring the tests directly inside my
class.

Any hints about that?
